attributes.action: stop using the term 'key worker' which is patronising, devisive, and insulting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone has a role to play in the job that they do. So called 'key workers' should not be given any more rights and benefits than anyone else. This abhorrent term is in real danger of dividing society into first and second class citizens. Decent pay would give some of these 'key workers' equal status not more rights. Not all 'key workers' are lowly paid!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
